front.title: Zero Trust Network Access DM for Network Cloud Interface

abstract.t: This document defines a YANG data model for implementing Zero Trust Network Access (ZTNA) principles at the network-cloud interface. It addresses security gaps in traditional network architectures by enforcing identity-based access control, least privilege enforcement, secure exposure of resources, and continuous monitoring. The model enables real-time policy enforcement between Cloud-Aware Service Orchestrators and Network Controllers, ensuring that only authorized entities have access to specific network and cloud telemetry.
